item.title: Cargo ship captain jailed for six years over deadly North Sea tanker crash
item.description: Vladimir Motin is sentenced after a crew member died in the crash between a cargo ship and tanker.

item.title: Deaths of at least 30 in UK's worst small boat disaster were avoidable, inquiry finds
item.description: Inquiry chair Sir Ross Cranston said "systemic failures" by authorities had led to the deadliest Channel small boat incident on record.

item.title: 55,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed in war with Russia, Zelensky says
item.description: The Ukrainian president also said a large number of people were "officially missing", meaning the total death toll is thought to be much higher.

item.title: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump
item.description: Their call comes in the wake of a flurry of visits by Western leaders to China in recent months.

item.title: UK's Â£8bn research fund faces 'hard decisions' as it pauses new grants
item.description: UKRI boss Ian Chapman said it had been told by the government to "focus and do fewer things better".
